column2: tm_shape(bradford_map) + tm_fill(col = c("p_White_British", "p_Pakistani"), title = c("% White British", "% Pakistani"), style = "fixed", breaks = c(0, 10, 20, 50, 100)) + tm_borders(col = "darkgrey", alpha = .25) + tm_scale_bar(position = c("LEFT", "BOTTOM")) + tm_compass(position = c("RIGHT", "TOP"))
